name: Snowball (itch) (Lionking236)
description:
Collect icoins,collect or buy more photos, unlock new musics, customize your ball. whatever you want from a  game... 

Plus if you have flash player on other platforms probably you can run this game on linux or mac too.

Just give it a try

use space,w,s for move ball, collect money for buy music and picture.

if you have advice please write in comments.
